DataSourcePortable.Name: CRM - Fase Exact ( GERAL )
DataSourcePortable.Content:
<DataSourceDefinition> <FromSql Alias="A" SelectCommand="SELECT A.FASEEXACT,COUNT(A.HANDLE) AS QTDE
FROM K_CRM_PESSOAS A
WHERE A.FASEEXACT IS NOT NULL
GROUP BY A.FASEEXACT
" /> <Fields> <Field Alias="FASEEXACT" From="A" Path="FASEEXACT" /> <Field Alias="QTDE" From="A" Path="QTDE" /> </Fields> </DataSourceDefinition>
